text: Niscaya ami tomara ocarata ahi praerana karaicho, yenekai nuha arau te'omra parararti nabisakalara prati ahi praerana karaichilo; arau ibraahima, ichama'ila, ichahakba, iyakbuba arau te'omra bansadhara, icha, a'i'uba, i'unucha, harauna arau chula'imanara ocarato ahi praerana karaichilo arau da'udaka pradana karaichilo yabura
